blogs.title: My First Blog
blogs.body: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does.
blogs.author: Serena Williams

blogs.title: Ninja Blog
blogs.body: It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.
blogs.author: Esther

blogs.title: Esther Blog
blogs.body: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
blogs.author: Oscar Wilde
